about me

I'm an experienced software engineer who currently lives in São Paulo, Brazil. My interests range from coding to user experience. I am also interested in cloud, agile and collaborating and building out new ideas. Community Organizer at NodeSchool Sorocaba and Sorocaba Node.js User Group. I enjoy learning, travel and healthy life.

I am positive that I can bring your company many benefits with my experience, background, and forward thinking.

about this website

It was developed using Node.js, Hapi framework and Bootstrap. Gulp tasks were used to perform uglify and compress of css/js/image files.

It was deployed into cloud using Amazon Lightsail.

Hope you enjoy it!
